about_the_game:
Check out the Demo

The demo includes the prologue of the game, the savefiles from the demo are fully compatible with the full version.

Main Characters

Story

Barry and his friends Arlene and Nellie decide to visit the Pit of Evil, the place where they lost their friend Fynn. While spending the night in a tent, things take an unexpected turn. The group gets seperated, while Barry suffers the same fate as Fynn, falling into the Pit of Evil.

Features

  • Twisted Story with mystery elements
  • Characters that hold deep connections to each other
  • Fast-Paced ATB System (Active Time Battle)
  • On map encounters (Chrono Engine)
  • Dungeons using puzzle elements
  • Dramatic cut-scenes, including flashbacks
  • Challenging boss fights
  • Interactive world map and journal system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
